text: Hey is anyone aware of an existing integration of syncing prices of Magento products to a HubDb table?

Hey Awesome Community!

Can I use your brain for a minute?

I need to build something that would update cards at many different place in a website (Resources center, You may also like module, etc.)  when there is a new content offer published as a landing page.

This is something quite easy to do if content was a blog post, but with landing page it is another thing.

My thoughts are that I would rather use HubDB to list all my content offer or  use page publishing API.

What do you think?

I think this is a good use case for HubDB. In most content management systems this sort of stuff is handled as a ‘content type’ or a structure, which you can usually define fields for. So if i’m making a website for a dealer it’d be likely you’d want to setup a table for vehicles and include things like model, trim, price.

Not sure if you’re aware HubDB supports dynamic pages which could be quite useful in this scenario: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/building-dynamic-pages-with-hubdb>
did anything just happen to the HubSpot API?
Did the API just go down ?
<https://status.HubSpot.com/> <- it shows that everything is operational. But does anyone else notice HubSpot randomly throwing tons of 500 REST error responses?
Since I'm creating landing pages with this is it possible to dynamically redirect to different TY pages ?
not available but can be easily achieved, with little modification to our integration
